properties.title: Flowtrail Leukerbad
properties.abstract: Flowtrail Leukerbad - the bike trail for everyone! The trail leads from Rinderhütte to Torrentalp. The concept of the flowtrail fits for different target groups, who like mountainbiking a lot.
properties.description:
The route guidance of the flowtrail Leukerbad is integrated into the landscape with an average gradient of 10%. In combination with the locale topography, there are waves, small jumps as well a various curves. Jumping is possible but not mandatory. It is an attractive and easy-going downhill course, which appeals to both, pros and beginners.

Bikes can be rented at the mountain station Rinderhütte.
properties.name: Leukerbad Tourismus
